overview: World Hair Extensions is a worldwide hair supplier of 100% Indian Remy Human Hair Extensions & Virgin Indian Hair Extensions. Clients, salons, and celebrities from around the world choose them for premium Indian Hair because they know they can count on the attention to detail and the high standards of excellence. World Hair Extension’s Indian Hair is inspected strand by strand, securely packaged, and shipped directly to you and ready for installation. When your beauty depends on it, you can depend on World Hair Extensions for celebrity grade Indian Hair.
